title: Patcher Download - 250/221mb????
body:
How do i have an ETA of -2 minutes and my patcher is downloading more MB than its supposed to?

AND HOW DO I FIX IT....

replies.body:
I've had patches go to 700+/200MB or whatever, the patcher is cancer.

So I uninstalled my 10GB LoL installation, and reinstalled as 6.7GB. The patcher is a fucking cancer that will consume excess space every patch until you do a clean reinstall.
